name: DotS (With DotA Characters)
description:
it's simple  2d game, with 3 modes.

you can shoot with space key and move with top and bottom arrow keys.

buy health with "1" and item with "2" or click direct on items

Engine: Game Maker 8.1
Powered by: Gamemakerservers

Game modes:
Death match
boss viper
Levels
